about_the_game:
Did you ever dream as a small child to become a paving artist? To lay pavers according to your plan and make good money doing it? Sounds like the perfect life! Now you have the opportunity to make your dreams come true and gain more and more customers with your own original projects.



During the game Paver Simulator you perform tasks, during which the most important thing is creativity and precision. According to your design you lay different types of paving stones, so you earn money and raise the level of your reputation. This unique simulator allows you to relax after a hard day at school or work



Choosing the location and how to lay the pavers is extremely easy, thanks to various special mechanics.



Are you ready to face the challenges you as a paving contractor? Will you become the best paving artist in the area? Test your skills in the Paver Simulator

Features:
- large number of quests
- Varied choice of shape and colors of paving blocks
- unique mechanics to support the construction process
- game from the perspective of first person view

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 or Newer
  • Processor: Intel Core i5
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVidia GeForce GTX 750
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 20 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 or Newer
  • Processor: Intel Core i7
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVidia GeForce GTX 1050
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 20 GB available space

short_description: Design and craft stunning pavements with precision and style. Choose from various materials, earn money, and build your reputation as a master paver. Are you ready to pave your way to the top? Test your creativity skills and create a masterpiece in Paver Simulator!
